author: Abigail Hess
title: How the class of 2020 became the class of COVID-19
description: To address the coronavirus pandemic, many colleges and universities have closed their doors and moved classes online — a shift that students, professors, administrators and public health officials agree will play an important role in limiting the virus' trans…
